description: Juicy pork and beef meatloaf loaded with herbs and topped with creamy mashed potato. Try this easy family friendly dinner recipe for a sure-fire hit.
keywords: Classic Meatloaf With Mashed Potato Topping
name: Classic Meatloaf With Mashed Potato Topping Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat mashed potato and gravy according to packet instructions. Spread potato over meatloaf. Serve drizzled with gravy and topped with remaining parsley leaves.
